title: Having Difficulty Reinstalling the Game
body:
So I just had my computer wiped due to adware galore and I had to reinstall some stuff including League of Legends.
Okay, so whenever I enter the Wizard, there's an error saying that Microsoft Visual 2005 C++ x64 wasn't installed properly. 

Can anyone help me? D:

replies.body:
I tried that and I still got the same error message.
>__>

*raises hand*  
**I can help!**

This error is typically caused when there is an existing, corrupted version of Visual C++ 2005 already present on the computer. The most common solution is to [uninstall](http://www.cnet.com/how-to/how-to-uninstall-an-app-or-program-in-windows-10/) all current versions of C++ 2005 in your list of programs.

After you've uninstalled all 2005 versions, go ahead and restart your PC. After your PC boots back up, ensure you've installed all available [windows updates](http://www.update.microsoft.com/). After ensuring your system is current on updates, download and install a fresh copy of [Visual C++ 2005](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387). 

Let me know if this helped. :)
